## PersistenceService interface

The Persistence Service available in the application. This service is responsible for saving and loading data packages.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PersistenceService 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [load(file)](./app-framework.persistenceservice.load.md) | Load a data-package file from zip file contents. |
|  [save(projectName)](./app-framework.persistenceservice.save.md) | Save a data-package to a zip file and download to the client machine. |
